category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute

sentences.english: Our regiment is attached to the first division.

sentences.english: This article discusses mainly the application of the theory of Markov Chains in the configuration of Locomotive Depot.
